translations: 对（某人）施催眠术；使（某人）着迷（hypnotise 的现在分词，等于 hypnotizing）

sentences.sentence: A hypnotising video animation morphing what appears to be hundreds of faces seamlessly into one another has fast become a viral sensation.
sentences.translation: 法国艺术家创作了一幅令人眼花缭乱的视频动态图像，图像显示了数百张接连变换出现的人脸。这张图像已迅速引起轰动。
